summary:
Add 6 Vigilant of Stendarr followers
Marriageable too.
Vanilla Assets only No Script
descriptionHtml:
Add 6 Vigilant of Stendarr followers
Marriageable too.
Vanilla Assets only No Script

[color=#ffff00][size=5]Thank you for the support and donation:
[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=3]I never thought the community here on nexus are very kind people, I cant thank enough these individuals
who supported me financially so I'll just post their name in my mod pages.
[color=#ffff00][size=3][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7889849/?]mayd4me[/url][/size][/size][/color][/size][/color]
[color=#ff7700][size=5][color=#f4f4f4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/3089165/?]Huniken[/url][/color][/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff][size=5][color=#00ffff][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4053262/?][b]C.P.[/b][/url][/size][/color]
[b]Thierry[/b][/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=5](mysterious donator)[/size][/color]

[color=#00ff00][size=4]NOW WITH [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10506/?]Robed Steel Plate Armor by [b]MadCat221[/b][/url][b]
YOU NEED TO DOWNLOAD IT GIVE THEM THAT AWESOME ARMOR
AND DOWNLOAD MY ESP UPGRADE

Recommended Mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83350/?]Keeper Carcette Survives by [b]Ruhadre[/b][/url][/b][/size][/color]
[color=#00ff00][size=4][b]Make [b]Stendarr's Beacon[/b] more functional base[/b][/size][/color]

I create this mod for my vanilla skyrim gameplay.
My plan is I would only use this for my personal use but maybe other's would like it so I upload it.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Location: [b]Stendarr's Beacon[/b]

Follower List:

Mystriny Female Nord
Spellsword Healer Lightomancer Cryomancer

Bvwgor Male Redguard
Spellsword Healer Lightomancer Pyromancer

Tomy Male Dark Elf
Spellsword Healer Lightomancer Electromancer

Anihy Female Imperial
Mage Lightomancer Healer Paralyzer

Jouyce Female Breton
Ranger Lightomancer Healer

Blind Jaw Male Orc
Two handed Super Tanker

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requirements: Skyrim Latest Update, Dawnguard, Dragonborn
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation: Use NMM or manually install by drag and drop to Data Folder
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update to latest version: Download and Overwrite if ask
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uninstall: Use NMM or manually delete files and esp (Completely safe to uninstall anytime)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compatibility: Compatible with all Mods because I only use Vanilla Assets
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Future Plans: Add More Vanilla Followers
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Check out my other Skyrim mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/27633780/?tb=mods&pUp=1]dlarkz skyrim mods[/url]
author: dlarkz
